english.segment1: Verse 1: You've been hurt, and you're jaded. You're telling me that your faith is fading fast. You wonder what it's even worth. You've got doubts, and I get it. 'Cause I've been in the place you're livin'. Scared that love will only get you burned
english.segment2: Chorus: Don't quit on Love 'cause you're broken. Don't quit on hope. You're not hopeless. You know the sun will rise again. This is not the end. I know this complicated world gets you down, but don't give up. Don't give up. Don't quit on Love. 'Cause love. Won't quit on us. Love. Won't quit on us
